Sentencas: A dynamic model for a finite volume of cell based on physical principles is built in the form of a nonlinear state-space model to investigate dynamic behaviors of tubular solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) and develop a control relevant model for further control studies.
Titulo: Dynamic modeling of a finite volume of solid oxide fuel cell: The effect of transport dynamics

Sentencas: Dynamic effects induced by diffusions, intrinsic impedance, fluid dynamics, heat exchange and direct internal reforming/shifting (DIR) reactions are all considered.
Titulo: Dynamic modeling of a finite volume of solid oxide fuel cell: The effect of transport dynamics

Sentencas: Cell temperature, ingredient mole fractions, etc. are the state variables and their dynamics are investigated.
Titulo: Dynamic modeling of a finite volume of solid oxide fuel cell: The effect of transport dynamics

Sentencas: Dynamic responses of each variable when the external load changes are simulated.
Titulo: Dynamic modeling of a finite volume of solid oxide fuel cell: The effect of transport dynamics

Sentencas: Simulation results show that fuel flow, inlet pressure and temperature have significant effects on the dynamic performance of SOFC.
Titulo: Dynamic modeling of a finite volume of solid oxide fuel cell: The effect of transport dynamics

Sentencas: Further it is shown that, compared to other inlet flow properties, cathode side air inlet temperature has the most significant effect on SOFC solid phase temperature and performance.
Titulo: Dynamic modeling of a finite volume of solid oxide fuel cell: The effect of transport dynamics

Sentencas: Compared with inlet pressures and temperatures, the effect of flow velocity is not significant.
Titulo: Dynamic modeling of a finite volume of solid oxide fuel cell: The effect of transport dynamics

Sentencas: Simulation also indicates that the transient response of SOFC is controlled mainly by the dynamics of cell temperature owing to its large heat capacity.
Titulo: Dynamic modeling of a finite volume of solid oxide fuel cell: The effect of transport dynamics
